attributes.action: Mandatory not optional for employers to take up wage retention scheme.
attributes.additional_details: Employers are still afraid of the length of this pandemic and are stating financial insecurity due to the pandemic as a reason to lay-off as they are unwilling to take the risk of when their business model could again become profitable, which is immoral. I would encourage parliament to enforce key industries or any employer stating financial issues as a reason in redundancy be enforced to take up a mandatory 3 month trial of the wage retention scheme prior to being able to enforce a redundancy.
attributes.background:
Employers should be required by law to take up the wage retention scheme for 3 months during this pandemic.

This is particularly applicable to industries directly affected, such as aviation or those employers stating financial security or loss due to the virus, as some employers.
